gobblin.source.extractor.extract.jdbc

Class SqlQueryUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.source.extractor.extract.jdbc.SqlQueryUtils

  • public class SqlQueryUtils
extends Object
    A helper class for handling SQL queries as strings. This is a temp solution until something more robust is implemented.
    See Also:
    https://github.com/linkedin/gobblin/issues/236

    • Constructor Detail

      • SqlQueryUtils

    • Method Detail

      • addPredicate

        public static String addPredicate(String query,
                                  String predicateCond)
        Add a new predicate(filter condition) to the query. The method will add a "where" clause if none exists. Otherwise, it will add the condition as a conjunction (and). Note that this method is rather limited. It works only if there are no other clauses after "where"
        Parameters:
        query - the query string to modify
        predicateCond - the predicate to add to the query
        Returns:
        query the new query string
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the predicate cannot be added because of additional clauses

      • castToBoolean

        public static boolean castToBoolean(String fieldValue)
        Cast a string representation of a boolean value to a boolean primitive. Used especially for Oracle representation of booleans as varchar2(1) Returns true for values such as [t|true|yes|1] and false for [f|false|no]. If a boolean value cannot be trivially parsed, false is returned.
        Parameters:
        fieldValue - the value of the boolean string field
